title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles IDW Series (2011-2013) (Complete Se
description:
English | CBR and CBZ | 63 Issues

Publisher:  IDW Publishing

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #1-23 + SDCC Ashcan, Annual, and FCBD Special (Ongoing)
Publication Date:  August 24, 2011 - June 26, 2013
They're BACK!  The original heroes in a half-shell make a triumphant return to comics! Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael reunite to bring their ninja aptitude and teenage attitude to IDW Publishing in this all-new, action-packed series. Featuring a cast of familiar characters-Master Splinter, April O'Neill, Casey Jones, and more-and true to the spirit of the original comics created by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird, the TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES are bigger and badder than ever, and ready to rock old and new fans alike!

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Micro Series #1-8
Publication Date:  December 7, 2011 - September 5, 2012
Following in the tradition of the original TMNT microseries comes eight stand-alone tales centering on each Turtle and their allies. 

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Color Classics #1-7, 9-11
Publication Date:  May 9, 2012 - June 5, 2013
Relive the exciting origins of TMNT, this time in all-new full-color comics! This is where world-wide Turtle mania started! Detailing the entire origin of the Turtles and their first fateful encounter with the Foot Clan and the Shredder! This is your chance to get in on the ground floor of the entire Mirage Studios experience, with the most successful independent comic of all time. Don't miss it!  This series reprints the first eleven Eastman and Laird issues (with the exception of issue #8 due to guest character rights ownership problems) published by Mirage.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Color Classics Micro Series #1-4
Publication Date:  August 8, 2012 - April 10, 2013
The original Micro-Series is BACK, this time with all-new colors! Raphael struggles to control his inner rage until he finds the perfect outlet: Casey Jones! It's hot head vs. hot head and neither is going down without a fight! This could be the beginning of a beautiful friendship!
This series reprints the four Eastman and Laird turtle Micros published by Mirage in full color with coloring by Tom Smith.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Secret History of the Foot Clan #1-4
Publication Date:  January 9, 2013 - March 20, 2013
Demons, ninjas, and hostile takeovers-- what more can you expect from a TMNT comic? The first installment of this new miniseries reveals a history never told before about the original founder of the Foot. Join the Turtles as they get a history lesson that they will never forget!

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Villians Micro-Series #1-3 (Ongoing)
Publication Date:  April 17, 2013 - June 19, 2013
Krang was not always the feared warlord he is today. Once he was the spoiled prince of a falling dynasty. One disastrous mission to a penal colony planet changed all of that! Stranded by himself and surrounded by enemies, Krang faces the ultimate test for survival! See how this seemingly helpless alien grew to become a legend... and a leader!  This series was originally scheduled to be 4 issues, but it looks like it has been extended to 8 issues.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles New Animated Adventures (FCBD 2013)
Jumping from screen to page, it's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles NEW ANIMATED ADVENTURES! This unique series captures the heart of the smash Nickelodeon television show with brand-new stories. Full of action, excitement and laughs, this is the perfect all-ages comic to get you seeing green!!  This series starts this month.

There are other trade paperbacks that reprint older issues of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles that have not been included in this torrent.

Thanks goes to DarthScanner, TheGroup, An Evil Scan, Penner, HALO, and theProletariat for this release.
